title: Why did you take my draven skin
body: you took my chance for pulse fire ez after I saved up all the essence the shard was gone also I had beast hunter draven as a gift and now I cant use him anymore what happened I am sorry for posting this in the wrong area I don't usually have complaints but his one I am getting annoyed with. I had the skin shard for pulse fire ezreal in a chest and I was so stoked, but didn't have enough essence. I have witnesses if you need. cause I know that one wouldn't pop up in purchase history. that's why I haven't complained until now.

replies.body: We'd like to look into this and see what's going on.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can work with you individually and review the situation.  We'll get back to you!
